name: Super Kayass Ball
description:
A short game about shooting flashy things into a red ball. Enjoy!

Made during the Global Game Jam 2018.

Installation Instructions: 

1) Unzip / extract the downloaded file

2) Open the folder where you extracted the file

3) Double-click on SuperKayassBall.exe

4) Choose your settings

5) Have fun!

Credits: 

Mathieu Grimbaire: audio

Arthur Peralta: design and levels

Théo Touaty: design and code

Thanks for playing! :)
